translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「川よりもぜーんぜんでかい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's way, way bigger than a river.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 川の水が流れ込んで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The river's water flows into it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でーっかく集まったモンって思ったらええかな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so you can think of it as a huge gathering of all that water."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えーっ、うっそだー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ehh, no way!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 川の果てって、大陸の下でしょ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The end of the river is under the continent, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 流れ込んだら落っこちてっちゃうじゃん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If water flows in there, it would just fall off, wouldn't it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おー、ナギは物知りさんやなあ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, Nagi, you're quite the knowledgeable one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せやけど、十年にいっぺん、その大陸の端っこから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But, once every ten years, from the edge of that continent,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ごっつい量の水が迫り上がってくるんや」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a huge amount of water surges upward."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すっごいでー。向こう30キロ以上、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's amazing. For over 30 kilometers over there,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ずーっと水やねん。しかも、塩水や。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's all water, and saltwater at that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シナ海と同じやな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's the same as the China Sea."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「シナ海……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The China Sea..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カイズのある川中島の、周りの内海。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The inland sea around the Kawanakajima where Kaizu is.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あそこも海って言われてるけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They say it's a sea too, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こっちはスケールが違うし、時々めっちゃ荒れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This one is on a different scale, and sometimes it gets really rough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一筋縄ではいかない魔境やで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a mysterious area you can't handle easily."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほへーーー……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whoaーーー..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あいにく、どこまでも果てなくとはいかんけどな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Unfortunately, it doesn't stretch endlessly forever.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: けど、その時の海にしか現れんモンスターや、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But monsters that appear only in that sea at that time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見たこともないお宝なんかが見つかるんや」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and treasures you've never seen before can be found."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「誰が言ったか、食べ物いっぱい、お宝いっぱいの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Someone said there's a dream-like island full of food and treasure,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夢みたいな島がある、なーんて噂もあるな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's the rumor, you know."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すごーい……すごいね、おとーさん……ね、ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Amazing... really amazing, Dad... right, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだ、思い出したぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, I remember now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それで海に冒険に行くって言ったんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's why I said we're going on an adventure to the sea."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「せやで。だからばーっちり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Exactly. So perfectly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 海への冒険が出来るように……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you'll be able to go on an adventure to the sea..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……どうしたの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...What's wrong?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや。船の話しよかと思ったけど、やめた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No. I thought about talking about the ship, but I quit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実際に見てもろた方がええやろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's better if you actually see it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えーっ。ちょっとくらい教えてよー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ehh. At least tell me a little!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ネタバレは御法度や。着けば分かる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No spoilers allowed. You'll understand once you arrive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さ、今日の紙芝居はここまでー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now then, today's picture-story show ends here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みずあめは1個1Gやでー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One piece of mizurame (sweet syrup candy) is 1G."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「みずあめ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mizurame?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おおう……ボケが通じひん……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, oh... my joke didn't get through...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これがジェネレーションギャップ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the generation gap..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺も紙芝居の作法なんぞ知らんぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't even know the etiquette of a picture-story show."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はいはい、みんなー。もう寝ましょうねー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, everyone. Let's go to bed now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そろそろお休みの時間ですよー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's about time to rest."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「毛布どうぞー。はい、リセットちゃん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Here's a blanket. Here you go, Reset-chan."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はーいっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やって来たシィルから毛布を受け取って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset accepts the blanket brought over by Sealu,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセットがランスと一緒にくるまる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and snuggles up together with Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mmm."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へへ。一緒に寝ていい？　おとーさん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe. Can I sleep together? Dad?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーん……ま、よかろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... well, I suppose that's fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 寝相悪くするなよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't sleep too restlessly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わーいっ。ごそごそ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yay! Rustle rustle..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This one is on a different scale, and sometimes it gets really rough.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a mysterious area you can't handle easily."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほへーーー……」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あいにく、どこまでも果てなくとはいかんけどな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Unfortunately, it doesn't stretch endlessly forever.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: けど、その時の海にしか現れんモンスターや、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But monsters that appear only in that sea at that time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見たこともないお宝なんかが見つかるんや」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and treasures you've never seen before can be found."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Someone said there's a dream-like island full of food and treasure,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夢みたいな島がある、なーんて噂もあるな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's the rumor, you know."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すごーい……すごいね、おとーさん……ね、ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Amazing... really amazing, Dad... right, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだ、思い出したぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, I remember now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それで海に冒険に行くって言ったんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's why I said we're going on an adventure to the sea."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「せやで。だからばーっちり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Exactly. So perfectly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 海への冒険が出来るように……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you'll be able to go on an adventure to the sea..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……どうしたの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...What's wrong?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや。船の話しよかと思ったけど、やめた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No. I thought about talking about the ship, but I quit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実際に見てもろた方がええやろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's better if you actually see it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えーっ。ちょっとくらい教えてよー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ehh. At least tell me a little!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ネタバレは御法度や。着けば分かる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No spoilers allowed. You'll understand once you arrive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さ、今日の紙芝居はここまでー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now then, today's picture-story show ends here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みずあめは1個1Gやでー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One piece of mizurame (sweet syrup candy) is 1G."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「みずあめ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mizurame?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おおう……ボケが通じひん……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, oh... my joke didn't get through...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これがジェネレーションギャップ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the generation gap..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺も紙芝居の作法なんぞ知らんぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't even know the etiquette of a picture-story show."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はいはい、みんなー。もう寝ましょうねー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, everyone. Let's go to bed now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そろそろお休みの時間ですよー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's about time to rest."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「毛布どうぞー。はい、リセットちゃん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Here's a blanket. Here you go, Reset-chan."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はーいっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やって来たシィルから毛布を受け取って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset accepts the blanket brought over by Sealu,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセットがランスと一緒にくるまる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and snuggles up together with Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mmm."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へへ。一緒に寝ていい？　おとーさん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe. Can I sleep together? Dad?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーん……ま、よかろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... well, I suppose that's fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 寝相悪くするなよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't sleep too restlessly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わーいっ。ごそごそ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yay! Rustle rustle..."
